text: ‘Oh ka abeh buet ban lagee janji Musa ngon ahli teuma geulangkah Bak geujak geu-eu rap ngon buket Thur Sang-sang apui hu geukalon mirah Geukheun bak ahligeuh tapreh gata Apui lon mita kadang na mudah ‘Oh lon woe euntreuk lon peugah haba Kadang peue atra nyang lon eu mirah Got pih na apui bacut lon peuwoe Jeuet digeutanyoe tatueng phaedah Got pih tamadeueng peuseuuem badan
